OOC: *Sigh*, there he goes again. Unless your name is Thriller 7, Mew, Worl=
dInd, Dogg00, FRKBOY, Red Convoy, or MathWizard, there is no reason you sho=
uldn't be respected, especially by yourself. I think you're awesome, Lurker=
, you've done many great things for Neo Beast Wars and DBZSF...
